headline: Hershey (HSY) Is Up 6.1% After Securing Key Cocoa Tariff Exemption - What's Changed
summary: Hershey recently secured a tariff exemption on cocoa imports, effective from November 13, 2025, potentially lowering its quarterly import expenses by around US$50 million and improving its cost structure. This policy change stands out for its direct and substantial effect on ingredient costs, a critical consideration given cocoa’s importance to Hershey’s products and profitability. We'll explore how this cost-saving tariff exemption could reshape Hershey’s investment narrative by altering...
